Articles.Content:
Hi there! I made a mod! It does things! Here is what it does.

Parts added:

Compressed Air Engine:

A simple engine that compresses filtered air using electricity, and exhausts it out a tiny nozzle. It has many different uses. Now, we don't quite know what those uses are, so if you find out what those are, be sure to tell us.

Advanced Compressed Air Engine:

"Like Compressed Air Engine with Advanced!" -Machinima

The ACA engine runs off a mix of filtered air, monoprop, and electricty. The "brilliant minds" behind this engine said that it needs monoprop because "It would be 'OP' if it was just flat out better than the basic compressed air engine", whatever that means. An unintended sideffect of this is that it makes the air compress better, so yay?

Nuclear Thermal Ramjet:

Okay, its actually more like a scramjet, our engineers thought that ramjet sounded cooler. Anyways, this state of the art uses filtered air, heats it up to 'like a gazillion degrees' using a nuclear heating system, then exhausts it out the back. It needs to be moving pretty darn fast before it produces much thrust. Also, it LOVES to overheat. Also, it can only throttle down to 75% of full thrust. Good luck!

Advanced Hybrid Engine Precooler:

When one of our engineers was trying to solve the problem of how to make the Nuclear Ramjet less explode-y during his lunch break, he found out that his food was a bit to hot, so he blew on it to cool it down. This gave him the idea to "Blow really hard on the engine" to cool it down. No one could take him seriously due to how he had phrased his proposal, so, instead he just made a really fast fan, hooked it up to a fridge, then stuck it in an aerodynamic case. Also, it seems that it cools more efficiently when it moves faster. That engineer's idea wasn't completely full of hot air.

Deoxygenizer:

Turns IntakeAir into IntakeAtm.

Advanced Deoxygenizer:

Now with 25% less resource wasting! (turns IntakeAir into IntakeAtm AND oxidizer)

Reoxygenizer:

IntakeAtm and oxidizer goes in, IntakeAir comes out. You can't explain that! (Its okay, neither can we.)

Here are some pictures

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Anyways, here is the DL:

KerbalStuff!

Licence:

CC-BY 4.0 Internationals

Attributions:

  • The Community Resource Pack, to make this mod play nicely with others (RoverDude)
  • Regolith, for the converters (Also Roverdude)
  • A few models borrowed from Ven's Stock Part Revamp (Ven)
  • ModuleManager, (Sarbian)

This is my first attempt at making a mod, so please let me know what you think.

Edited December 15, 2014 by temporalExile
Hey, I'm wondering about what I should do with the compressed air engines, so some answers in the poll would be greatly appreciated.

this might give you some ideas

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98684-IDEA-REQUEST-Diverting-Jet-Thrust
These are pretty neat. You should use your descriptions from the OP for the in-game part descriptions.

Wait a sec... was that nuke engine getting too hot during the lunch break, or was the kerbal thinking about it during his lunch break? Honestly, that description could go both ways in that area. Maybe it was getting too hot because they forgot to turn it off during lunch. Just sayin'...
One thing I noted... the Compressed Air Engine is basically a ducted fan engine. And it does actually make sense for the ACA engine to use monopropellant; it would function as a ramrocket.

Wait a sec... was that nuke engine getting too hot during the lunch break, or was the kerbal thinking about it during his lunch break? Honestly, that description could go both ways in that area. Maybe it was getting too hot because they forgot to turn it off during lunch. Just sayin'...

But if they turn it off, then how are they supposed to cook their food?

New Update! Not much added, but there is a "Reoxygenizer" that can let your jet engines work in non-oxygenated atmospheres, provided you bring your own oxidizer. Let me know if any thing needs to be balanced.

INTEREST CHECK.

With 1.0 Aero engine overhaul, there are a bunch of new possibilities for this mod. I was wondering if anyone would be interested if this mod was updated. ALSO, would anyone care for a set of miniaturized Resource mining and processing parts?
Hey! These were pretty neat engines. I sure wouldn't say no to having them updated. That Nuclear Thermal Ramjet was fun to try to fly with.

Alright, I'm going to be rebranding this mod and re-releasing it Within a few weeks (With some smaller mining equipment thrown in).

Could a moderotr Moderator lock this thread?
